A personal AI companion, that will help you to be better everyday.

It is personalised ! No need to put your information again and again. It knows you.

What features does the version 1 have ?

Fitness Coach/Diet Coach

Personalized workouts, Exercise routines, Training tips, Nutritional advice, Meal planning, Balanced diet recommendations

Daily Progress Tracking

Weight monitoring, Workout log, Food diary, Progress reports

Auto Adjustment of Plans

Adaptive fitness plans, Smart goal setting, Customized diet adjustments, Automated plan optimization, Real-time feedback

Product Objectives


What problem does this product fix?
Personal coaches are not that personal, they cost a lot, they don't know about your daily routines, and they don't like readjusting plans.

Key values.

Personalised, cost-efficient, live tracking, AI-based re-adjustment.

Product Vision


Future:
We want Sensei to be omnipresent. Fitness, Productivity, Learning etc. You name it, your Sensei will help you !

Currently:

Sensei works as a fitness coach, that includes everything. From Exercises to Diet.

Trust us and feel free to try our service
